sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The authors thank Ms. Tenzin Choedon for help with EM analysis.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported in part by intramural funds from ICGEB (NK) and NIAID grant 1R21AI129477 (FK). The funders had no role in any aspect of the performance of the study or in the decision to submit the work for publication.

sec.title: Author Contributions
sec.p: Literature search: SS; Figures: RS, RKS, SS, NK; Study design: SS, NK, JKL, FK; Data collection: RS, RKS, VR, UA, GB, JAA; Data analysis and interpretation: SS, NK, JKL, FK; Writing: SS and NK; Approval of final manuscript: all authors.
